title: Control your finances today!
subtitle: Join the beta and experience the future of personal finance. No complications, no confusing interfaces.
value_proposition: Manage your money with WhatsApp + AI

questions.question: Is it really free?
questions.answer: Yes, completely free. No hidden costs, no fine print. We'll never charge you for basic features.

questions.question: How secure is my data?
questions.answer: Maximum security with end-to-end encryption. Only you can see your financial data. We never share information with third parties.

questions.question: Which countries are supported?
questions.answer: Available throughout Latin America with full support for local currencies. Starting in Peru and expanding progressively.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Absolutely. It's free and you can stop using Bilio at any time. Your data stays secure until you decide to delete it.
